name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael ALLEN, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael ALLEN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of July, 2009, the “Motion for Leave to File a Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc ” is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal in 30 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
975 A.2d 1080
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael ALLEN, Petitioner.
No. 46 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 2, 2009.
